about_the_game:
In Sovereign Stars, players see their empires spread across the galaxy in a live real-time strategy giving you complete freedom. Grab a couple friends, come up with a name for your new galactic society and conquer every planet.

Play both on the ground and in space all simultaneously. Manage the population and economy of multiple planets, research new technologies and dominate your foes. Only the last player standing wins this game.

Diverse Planets

Every planet has its own pros and cons, utilize them carefully.

Strategic Management

Cripple your foes' food supply and witness a live economic collapse.

Party Mode

Grab a few drinks and a couple of mates and share some good laughs as you make memories.

content_descriptors.notes: Party Mode is a mature mode that encourages consumption of alcohol. Party mode is disabled by default.

detailed_description:
In Sovereign Stars, players see their empires spread across the galaxy in a live real-time strategy giving you complete freedom. Grab a couple friends, come up with a name for your new galactic society and conquer every planet.

Play both on the ground and in space all simultaneously. Manage the population and economy of multiple planets, research new technologies and dominate your foes. Only the last player standing wins this game.

Diverse Planets

Every planet has its own pros and cons, utilize them carefully.

Strategic Management

Cripple your foes' food supply and witness a live economic collapse.

Party Mode

Grab a few drinks and a couple of mates and share some good laughs as you make memories.
name: Sovereign Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas lícitas
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Build your galactic empire, conquer planets and emerge as the last player standing in this real-time strategy game.
